summary:
About - I’m everywhere, I’m in everything - I’m BEEP. You can hear me everywhere, I'm on every device, I smile wen notis are on, I’m your microwave best friend, I beep in outer space or your elevator. Trust me, everything Beeps! I’ve been hidden from sight till now, locked in web2. No More! Let’s take over the world!

 How to buy? - Instructions on how to buy $BEEP cryptocurrency including creating a wallet, getting ETH, going to Uniswap, and swapping ETH for $BEEP.

 Roadmap - Steps in the roadmap for the $BEEP project including starting the movement, launching BEEP Everywhere, launching BEEP Everything, and global takeover.

 TOKENOMICS - Details about the $BEEP tokenomics including the token supply, buy/sell tax, LP percentage, and token address.
